articles.description: Latest news as Man Utd talk to Ruben Amorim after Erik ten Hag's sacking, plus reaction to the Ballon d'Or awards.
articles.title: Football latest: Man Utd in Amorim talks & Ballon d'Or reaction to Yamal, Rodri, Kane, Bonmati

articles.description: European champions Real Madrid were awarded best club but chose not to attend Monday's Ballon d'Or ceremony over a perceived lack of respect.
articles.title: Real Madrid awarded best club but absent from Ballon d'Or ceremony

articles.description: Have Ineos failed their first big test in charge of Manchester United with their delayed decision to sack Erik ten Hag?
articles.title: Erik ten Hag sacked by Man Utd: Questions for Ineos after sticking with Dutchman in summer

articles.description: England call all-rounder Jacob Bethell into the Test squad for the first time for the series in New Zealand.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Jacob Bethell earns first Test call-up as Jamie Smith to miss series

articles.description: The Los Angeles Dodgers are one win away from clinching their second World Series in five years, after a 4-2 victory over the New York Yankees gave them a 3-0 lead in the best-of-seven series.
articles.title: MLB World Series 2024: Yankees 2-4 Dodgers - visitors one game from title

articles.description: The Pittsburg Steelers win their third game in a row after Calvin Austin III scores two touchdowns against the New York Giants.
articles.title: New York Giants 18-26 Pittsburgh Steelers: Calvin Austin III scores two touchdowns

articles.description: Phoenix Suns duo Kevin Durant and Devin Booker combine to send Los Angeles Lakers tumbling to their first NBA defeat of the season.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James and LA Lakers unbeaten start ended by Phoenix Suns

articles.description: Manchester United have held talks about appointing Ruben Amorim as the club's new manager. BBC Sport take a closer look at the Portuguese.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Is Sporting manager right for Manchester United?

articles.description: Antonio Conte lost his first Serie A game as Napoli boss but the Italian's side are now flying high at the top, Mina Rzouki explains why.
articles.title: How Conte and McTominay have revolutionised Napoli

articles.description: Man City midfielder Rodri has a strong claim to be the most influential player in the world right now with just one defeat for club or country in the past 18 months.
articles.title: Ballon d'Or:  How good is 2024 winner Rodri?
